sources.name: CodificationsSource
sources.script:
source(output(
		Prop_0 as string,
		Prop_1 as string,
		Prop_2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> CodificationsSource

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
SelectMRQExternalIdAndDesc sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		ExternalId,
		ShortDesc
	)) ~> sink1

transformations.name: CodificationsSplit
transformations.script:
CodificationsSource split(Prop_0 == 'MRQ',
	Prop_0 == 'SGT',
	Prop_0 == 'CAR',
	Prop_0=='ENE',
	Prop_0=='ALI',
	Prop_0=='BDV',
	Prop_0=='TRA',
	Prop_0=='CPX',
	Prop_0=='CRE',
	Prop_0=='GRE',
	Prop_0=='MOD',
	Prop_0=='ALV',
	Prop_0=='ALR',
	Prop_0=='AFU',
	disjoint: false) ~> CodificationsSplit@(MRQ, SGT, CAR, ENE, ALI, BDV, TRA, CPX, CRE, GRE, MOD, ALV, ALR, AFU)

transformations.name: SelectMRQExternalIdAndDesc
transformations.script:
CodificationsSplit@MRQ select(mapColumn(
		Prop_0,
		ExternalId = Prop_1,
		ShortDesc = Prop_2
	))~> SelectMRQExternalIdAndDesc
